column2: All-round manager possessing in-depth knowledge of business development, channel management, contract negotiation and sales.
Goal orientated and dedicated- enjoying the challenge of a dynamic environment.
Skilled in developing and executing sales and business development strategies both B2B & B2C, including innovative sales approaches, partnership programmes and e-marketing.
Strong negotiator with extensive experience of leading complex negotiations at senior management level.
Developed motivational and team leadership skills.

'Revinate is a software platform designed exclusively for the hospitality industry that makes it easy for hotels, management and ownership groups to take control of their online reputation by using reviews and social media to learn from and engage with travellers. I specifically assist independent and smaller chains to operationalise improvements based upon their guests feedback, be that delivered on-site, via reviews or social mentions or post-stay surveys.
